short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a game of Bingo with any website's cultural lingo!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play a game of Bingo with any website's cultural lingo. Add a website's URL to your list of sites and make your own bingo cards. Play when visiting that website. Did you see a blog post about a certain recurring topic? Mark the box! Is your video creator's scheduled video late again? Mark the box! Has someone posted a popular meme in the comments? Before you know it - BINGO! Just for fun to engage with your fellow website lovers.

Leaderboards and bingo card set sharing coming soon!
